attributes.action: Remove mps from there job if they do not accept a public vote of any kind
attributes.additional_details:
Because weve had 4 years of mps calling us the public stupid and trying to overturn a public vote witch is un democratic
And shows they should not be an mp in this county
attributes.background: I would like it to be passed into law that going against a public vote should result in said mps lossing there seat

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions that call for people to lose their jobs, that includes MPs.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548400
